alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 9:26PM CST until November 20 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN IBERIA...SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE...EAST CENTRAL VERMILION AND WEST CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES... At 926 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Youngsville to near Avery Island, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, St. Martinville, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Cade, Coteau, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, and Jefferson Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
